author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Liar Obama Backtracks on Another Promise! Delays U.S. Troop Withdrawal in Afghanistan (Video) | Alternative
text:
(Before It's News)
15 Oct 15
Tyrant O screws our troops once again! Violating public trust AGAIN! Taking back yet another promise, he is keeping 9,800 troops in a FOURTEEN-YEAR old WAR in Afghanistan! After 14 years, a trillion dollars, and more than 2,300 American lives, President Obama announced today that the mission in Afghanistan is still not over.
Please pray for our troopps. I can NOT imagine how they are feeling after thinking they are coming home, that they must stay. God be with each and every one of them and their loved ones!
ALSO: Is Obama Mentally Ill? Experts Weigh In (Video) Obamaâ€™s Sanity Questioned
